summary:
Experienced in Clinical Research for 20 years. Started as a Clinical Research Associated in France, moved to Canada in the same role and evolved in the positions of Clinical Team Lead and Clinical Project Manager.
Currently assigned as Associate Clinical Lead Director / Sr Clinical Lead in Alzheimer's Disease studies, Dominantly Inherited Alzheimer's Disease and Apathy in Patients with Dementia.
Worked on International Phase II and III studies in multiple therapeutic areas. For the past 10 years, specialized mainly in CNS trials and more particularly Alzheimer's Disease and Dementia.

currentPositions.description:
First point of contact for IQVIA Prime and Partner sites across Canada.
Bringing support throughout conduct of studies from first approach up tosite closure.
Helping IQVIA team on any question, issue, difficulty, problematic faced with partner sites.
Identifying new study opportunities for partner sites in any therapeutic area.
Working closely with all IQVIA departments to bring solutions to our partner sites.
Developing the partner sites network.
Seeking new alliances with any supportive groups (therapy consortiums, governmentally funded bodies, non-govermental therapy-oriented initiatives..)
currentPositions.title: Associate Prime Site Director -  Site Solutions Team

skills.name: Excellent knowledge of the eDC platforms Inform and RAVE

headline: Associate Prime Site Director at IQVIA

message.text:
See the below message for anyone looking for a greatly experienced professional in the IT area with a solid track record of quality work and a constant enthusiasm to help people.
Tony would definitely be a great asset for any company looking for a skilled and conscientious partner.


https://lnkd.in/eskuSRVg
